### How to Install

The easiest way to use this template is via our CLI. Follow these steps:

<Steps>

<Step> Run the following command to start the CLI and install the template:</Step>

```bash
npx nyxbui@latest template
```

<Step> Follow the prompts: </Step>
   - Select the `portfolio` template.
   - Enter your project directory name.
   - Choose your package manager (npm, pnpm, yarn, bun).

<Step> The CLI will download the template, install dependencies, and optionally initialize a git repository. </Step>

<Step> Navigate to your project directory and start the development server: </Step>

```bash-session
cd <your-project-directory>
<package-manager> run dev
```
</Steps>

### What is this?

A complete template to market yourself and your portfolio to the world as a developer

### Why should I use this?

- ✅ Save 100+ hours of work
- ✅ No need to learn advanced animations
- ✅ Easy to configure and change
- ✅ 1-click download and setup.
- ✅ 5 minutes to update the text and images.
- ✅ Deploy live to vercel

### Features

- Hero Section
- About Section
- Work Section
- Education Section
- Projects Section
- Hackathon Section
- Contact Section
- Blog
